brand_names: Aruba Aloe Very Water Resistant Sunscreen - For Faces SPF 30
warnings: Warnings For external use only. When using this product keep out of eyes, rinse with water to remove. Stop using and ask a doctor if rash or irritation develops and lasts Keep out of reach of children
dosage_administration: Directions Apply generously before sun exposure and as needed Children under 6 months of age; ask a doctor.
indications: Uses Helps prevent sunburn Higher SPF gives more sunburn protection Retains SPF after 80 minutes of activity in the water or perspiring
